There was this one kid I knew. Let's call him Paul. He was a very neurotic guy. He was also jind of introverted and didn't like talking about himself. I tried so hard to get him to open up to people. But the only one he every opened up was me. I feel bad that we lost contact after we switched schools.

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556009536368724dfc840100#post_556009536368724dfc840100
Honestly I just get tired of how many times Thanatos links to opinion pieces by internet bloggers and treats it as facts.  We've argued about some really fucking dumb shit before.

Reason why I get so annoyed by him:
Him, "<insert link to internet blog>"
Me, "How does that prove anything?!"
Him, "Cause logic! (tm)"
Me, "There's no evidence!"
Him, "I did show you evidence though: my logic"
Me, "Your personal opinions are not evidence"
Him, "We're not getting anywhere"


The day he links to anything scientifically backed is the day hell freezes over.

"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55600a6e6368724486310900#post_55600a6e6368724486310900
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556009536368724dfc840100#post_556009536368724dfc840100
No it doesn't i'm not going to get bogged down in this sudo science bullshit again,[/bq]
Pseudo science?  Dude; you're one that constantly links to internet bloggers that aren't accredited and calls it science!  Opinion pieces by internet bloggers are not science.  If I was to open up a internet blog and have opinion articles on medicine that doesn't make me a doctor.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55600994636872589c820d00#post_55600994636872589c820d0
For me It mostly ended up the other way. 

I remember I was friends with this guy. And during lunch I drew a pic of one of our other friends (I was proud of it) and I go to show him right?

Dude gives me a funny look, _and crumbles up the paper and gives it back to me_.

I just stood there. Looking confused. 

~Also theeere was one kid I was a dick too though.~ ~I still feel terrible about that~ 

Good thing is he was still my friend though.
